title: Create FO-07 Mastra agents
description:
Create the FO-07 Mastra agents based on FO-04 patterns.

Files to create:
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-07/agent.ts` - Discovery agent
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-07/affirmation-agent.ts` - Affirmation agent
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-07/summary-agent.ts` - Summary agent
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-07/index.ts` - Exports

Reference implementation:
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-04/agent.ts` - Copy structure for discovery agent
- `src/mastra/agents/fo-04/affirmation-agent.ts` - Copy structure for affirmation agent

Key differences from FO-04:
1. Discovery agent: Same structure, uses fo-07-discovery KV keys
2. Affirmation agent: Same structure, uses fo-07-affirmation KV keys
3. Summary agent: New agent using fo-07-summary KV keys

Each agent should:
- Have a DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS fallback
- Have a createFO07*Agent factory function that loads from KV store
- Use getAgentSystemPrompt and getAgentModelName from services

Verify by checking TypeScript compilation.

⚠️ Do not close this tick until tsc compiles without errors.
acceptance_criteria: npx tsc --noEmit completes without errors in src/mastra/agents/fo-07/
closed_reason: Created FO-07 Mastra agents based on FO-06 patterns: agent.ts (discovery), affirmation-agent.ts (outputs 20 affirmations), summary-agent.ts (pre/post summary), index.ts (exports). All use fo-07-* KV keys. TypeScript compiles without errors.
